name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Tasks: a modern to-do list app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Tasks is a simple and fast to-do extension to help you stay organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Laundry lists can be overwhelming, so the main purpose of Tiny Tasks is to help you manage your day's tasks, one task at a time.
